about:
I am a web developer, working in both, backend and frontend programming.Excited for improving my skills and learning new technologies. I'm open to learn and work with any web technology

I like to write code from scratch and love the idea of bringing thoughts to life.
 I am passionate about my work. Because I love what I do, I have a steady source of motivation that drives me to do my best. I have cloned few websites from scratch during my learning journey at Masai School. Apart from that I like cycling, biking and chilling out with friends.
